ThingDef.Name: Gun_M3Predator_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M3 Predator
ThingDef.description: Standard issue pistol of the Alliance Military. Whilst it boasts stable recoil and decent accuracy for a pistol, it's not very powerful.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M6Carnifex_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M6 Carnifex
ThingDef.description: A mercenary issue hand cannon. Large caliber weapon that can punch through armour easily. Requires careful aiming to mitigate recoil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M8Avenger_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M8 Avenger
ThingDef.description: Standard issue assault rifle of the Alliance Military. Fully automatic and good accuracy. Uses lower caliber rounds to compensate for recoil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M9Tempest_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M9 Tempest
ThingDef.description: Standard issue sub-machine gun of the Alliance military. The rapid fire of this weapon can overwhelm even the most determined enemies. Ideally a personal defence weapon rather than an assault weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M15Vindicator_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M15 Vindicator
ThingDef.description: Marksman issue assault rifle of the Alliance Military. Fires a three round burst whilst maintaining accuracy and keeping decent recoil control.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M23Katana_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M23 Katana
ThingDef.description: Standard issue shotgun of the Alliance Military. Deadly and has a slightly extended range at the cost of a little less damage than older models.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M25Hornet_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M25 Hornet
ThingDef.description: Mercenary issue sub-machine gun. The quick burst fire of this weapon helps to maintain accuracy. Though low caliber, more shots land from this weapon than most others in its category.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M92Mantis_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M92 Mantis
ThingDef.description: Standard sniper rifle of the Alliance Military. Excellent long range accuracy and armour penetration. Not recommended for close quarters engagement.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M98Widow_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M98 Widow
ThingDef.description: Anti-materiel rifle of the Alliance Military. Tears through most known materials and has enourmous recoil to match. The sheer weight of the weapon means taking aim will take time.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_M300Claymore_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona M300 Claymore
ThingDef.description: Krogan issue shotgun. A massive and very heavy weapon. A single blast is capable of staggering some of the largest known creatures.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_N7Eagle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona N7 Eagle
ThingDef.description: Specialist issue pistol of the N7 special forces. Designed for longer range, the Eagle packs a huge punch to armour. With built in counter weights, the accuracy is almost unrivaled.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_N7Piranah_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona N7 Piranah
ThingDef.description: Specialist issue shotgun of the N7 special forces. Fully automatic shotgun that devastates anything at close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_N7Valkyrie_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona N7 Valkyrie
ThingDef.description: Specialist issue assault rifle of the N7 special forces. Rapid two-shot burst fire with armour piercing cores. Designed for marksmen who really need to overwhelm armoured targets.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_N7Valiant_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona N7 Valiant
ThingDef.description: Specialist issue sniper rifle of the N7 special forces. Superior accuracy and semi automatic fire allows this weapon to deal high power damage in quick follow up shots.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Gun_N7Hurricane_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona N7 Hurricane
ThingDef.description: Specialist issue sub-machine gun of the N7 special forces. Incredibly high rate of fire and surprising accuracy. Overwhelms personal defences.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
